typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Employee_Data as (Id as string, Name as string, Dep as string, Salary as string, Projects as (ProjectId as string, Role as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Employee_Data),
	mapColumn(
		id = Employee_Data,
		Name = Employee_Data,
		Dep = Employee_Data,
		Salary = Employee_Data,
		Projects = Employee_Data.Projects
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 select(mapColumn(
		id = id.Id,
		Name = id.Name,
		Dep = id.Dep,
		Salary = id.Salary,
		Projects = id.Projects
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		Name
	)) ~> sink1
